title: Hold up, Riot. You better have a Black Cleaver replacement.
body:
For those who haven't seen what Riot is planning on doing to Black Cleaver, they're making it into a heavily Fighter-focused item, giving it more hp, less damage, and a phage passive.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/04/47-pbe-update.html

And, y'know, that's fine. I'm sure many fighter champions are desperate for an item with Phage's effect that isn't Trinity Force.

But I swear to god, whoever's call it was to ***change*** one of ***the only good items for AD Casters***, who ***already have arguably the lamest itemization in the game*** needs to get in here and tell us another item *will* be coming out that fills the *exact same role* that current Black Cleaver does. As in right friggin' now.

How about you guys decide "Meh, Zhonyas isn't really a mage item, it's more for Tanks" and give it 30 AP and 100 armor too. I mean while you're in the mood to significantly alter a key item for an entire class, why not do it to one of the more popular roles too?

Because if there isn't a damage-focused Pen/AD/CDR item coming to replace Black Cleaver, and I mean *in the same patch*, that's all you're doing, and that needs to not happen.  AD Casters have ONE brutalizer item outside of the jungle item now, and it gives crit chance and attack speed (Youmous), *which should not be AD Caster stats*.

I get it, you like Tanks. You hate Assassins. Lee Sin, Vi, and Rek'Sai will be buffed. So from your perspective this seems all good, because these are Riot's favorite things.

But if you're forcibly turning an AD Caster item into a Fighter item, then I *swear to God* you better not whine about bullshit like Bruiser Kha'Zix as you did last season, because ***you are forcing AD Caster players to become Fighters*** with this kind of shortsighted change. Just making you guys aware since long-term consequences have historically not been Riot's strong point when it comes to balancing changes. 

This will make the Fighters who are already strong, stronger and the AD Casters weaker. It's going to force AD Casters to end up more like Fighters and you guys are going to be dumbfounded about why all the sudden former-assassins are now building like Bruisers, and then you're going to nerf the shit out of those supposed-to-be-caster champions into uselessness because that's how Riot handles the consequences of their own systematic changes: Punish the champions who are forced to be something outside their design vision to stay viable and end up overpowered.

Hope all you Zed and Talon players enjoy living through what Kha'zix players had to. Good luck.
